patthana8.23:4.1: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.23:4.2: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo ceva nanoasaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.23:4.3: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca naasaññojaniyo ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.23:5.1: Naasaññojaniyañceva nano ca saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.23:6.1: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca naasaññojaniyañceva nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.23:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
